{{disambig-more: '''''Minas Tirith Evening-Star''''' is a publication by the [[American Tolkien Society]].

The journal began publication in [[1967]], founded and edited by [[Philip W. Helms]]. In [[1975]], it merged with ''[[Letter-zine]]'', the news letter of the newly formed [[American Tolkien Society]], and it is published four times a year to this day.
The journal contains articles, poetry, reviews, fan fiction and artwork, and is devoted solely to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
